RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ESTILO ELEGANTE unhurried while saving ground through the far turn, swung out to the middle of the racetrack entering the stretch, closed with a rush under mild left handed urging and got up in the final strides. SCOOP THERE IT IS stalked the early pace, rallied two wide to make the lead in upper stretch, set the balance of the pace then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. MUSICAL RIDE away alertly, set the pace off the rail into the stretch then was outfinished. PEACH BELLINI passed tiring rivals. LADY MECHANIC pressed the pace two wide and gave way on the far turn. PRINCESS MORO was no threat. HALOFIED was through after a half. TIMES ADDED FOLLOWING REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Peach Bellini
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Scoop There It Is
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 2 wide, led late, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Halofied
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Mechanic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gave way 2nd turn

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Moro
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Estilo Elegante
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed with a rush mid track, up in final strides,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: W. S. Farish & Flag Lake II

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INCESSANT stalked the pace into the stretch rallied in the five path three wide to make the lead at the furlong marker and edged clear late under strong handling. POLISHED GEM set the pace for nearly five furlongs, was headed, fought back to regain command near the quarter pole, maintained a slight advantage nearing the furlong marker then couldn't handle the winner. STARSHIP MACYS was in tight nearing the first turn, boxed in along the inside for six furlongs, loomed boldly when the leader drifted to the four path in upper stretch then came up empty. FLAXEN was squeezed between rivals entering the clubhouse turn, trailed until deep stretch then passed tiring rivals. ALL AMERICAN JEWEL pressed the pace two wide for four and one half furlongs, gained a slight lead then weakened in the stretch. WICKED ECSTASY was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Starship Macys
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight 15/16pole, boxed in 6furlongs, bid rail, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Flaxen
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed 15/16pole, trailed, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Ecstasy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Polished Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, headed 2nd turn, fought back gamely, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: All American Jewel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led between calls, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Incessant
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, 5path, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 95. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 3. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAINT GOAR dueled for the lead along the inside through the first turn, dropped back, came on again two wide through the far turn to make the lead at the quarter pole, shook clear in upper stretch, jumped tracks nearing the wire and prevailed. CUMBER battled with the winner two wide on the first turn, shook clear, set the pace to the quarter pole, dropped back then came on again late in a game effort. IWILLPERSEVERE allowed to settle, finished with good courage between horses three wide. YOUVESAIDITALL bumped early, offered a bid four wide into the stretch then was outfinished. LAUTREC bumped early and failed to menace. BACK ALLEY CAT bumped early and was outrun. HEZA HANDFUL bumped early, stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Iwillpersevere
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, finished well 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Goar
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, dropped back, came again, drew clear, jumped tracks

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Handful
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped early, stalked inside, gave way late

ENTRY.NAME: Back Alley Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped early, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lautrec
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped early, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Youvesaiditall
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped early, middle move 4 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Cumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, shook clear, game second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHACO SPIRIT trailed down the backstretch, circled his field at will to make the lead at the top of the stretch then widened the balance of the trip to win as much the best while in hand late. AIN'T STRAIGHT chased the pace two wide for a half, gained a narrow lead momentarily then couldn't handle the winner. NOT A GAME close up three wide, dropped back on the turn, came on again along the inside, drifted out to the five path entering the stretch then was outfinished. MASTER vied for the lead four then three wide and was through after a half. ICON rushed to lead inside rivals before a quarter, set the pace for a half then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Icon
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace half, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Ain't Straight
ENTRY.OWNER: Terrazas Jennifer Terrazas Eduardo and CG Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, drew even, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Not a Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, dropped back turn, came again, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 4-3wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Chaco Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled field, much the best, handily,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Helen Y. Painter & Shirley I. Gay

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 3. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weig ht Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONTAUK COVE stalked the pace into the stretch, responded readily when set down, rallied three wide to make the lead past the three sixteenths pole then widened the balance of the trip under brisk handling to win as much the best. GIO SAMMY with the second flight two wide, shifted out to the five path entering the stretch, rallied determinedly and finished clear for second. COLOMBARD never far back, finished with good courage in the six path. GET HAMMERED battled for the lead along the inside and faded late. THE COOKIE MAN dueled for the early lead two wide, shook clear entering the turn, set the pace to the top of the stretch then weakened late. HIDDEN RULER failed to menace. MOON LAUNCH was outrun. WISE KHOZAN was no threat. KEYED ON TOP was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Get Hammered
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, shook clear turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Gio Sammy
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, angled out 5path, late rally, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Launch
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Montauk Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Wise Khozan
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Colombard
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished determinedly 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Keyed On Top
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Frank F Romocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOMUCHSUGAR close up from the start two wide, moved closer through the turn, dropped inside the leader, rallied along the rail to make the lead past the furlong marker and finished full of run to win going away. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS away alertly, set the pace off the rail until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. RUNLIKEJACKIEO close up along the inside, altered course to the six path entering the stretch and went evenly. SUSHI Q trailed early, shifted out to the six path at the top of the stretch, lugged in and tiring rivals. SENORA PANQUEQUES was no factor. DISCREET ENERGY stalked the pace three wide into the turn then weakened. BODE'S ROSE chased the pace two wide and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Senora Panqueques
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Sushi Q
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Runlikejackieo
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, altered course 6path, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Shakeurskinnylegs
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Somuchsugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rallied inside, full of run, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sheltowee Farm, Michael E. Evans II & Travis A. Evans

ENTRY.NAME: Bode's Rose
ENTRY.OWNER: Pocket Aces Racing LLC and Susan Anderson Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Discreet Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, weakened turn,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JANUARY 3. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNTAPPED ENERGY stalked the pace into the turn, rallied three wide to make the lead in upper stretch and shook clear late under brisk handling in the six path. SPEAK LIGHTLY trailed into the turn, swung wide, rallied in the middle of the racetrack and got up for second. ORBITING THE SKY never far back, finished with good courage between rivals. ROSE RING allowed to settle, moved up along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. MISS OVER THERE sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch and weakened late. LEADING INDICATOR failed to menace. CATLIKE pressed the pace two wide and was through after a half. TIMES ADDED FOLLOWING REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Rose Ring
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Orbiting the Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, between horses,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace upper stretch, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Catlike
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Untapped Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Speak Lightly
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, rallied mid track, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Leading Indicator
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 12800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JULY 3. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GILES never far back, closed willingly four wide through the far turn, made the lead in upper stretch and drew off under brisk handling. SEMINOLE JUSTICE pressed the early pace along the inside, shifted outside the leader entering the far turn, came on again near mid track and finished clear for second. KING OF THE RING trailed into the stretch, swung wide, angled in late and was steadily gaining ground six wide. KLAATU battled for the early lead two wide, remained a sharp threat into the far turn, dropped back then passed tiring rivals in the middle of the racetrack. ARTEMUS EAGLE moved up two wide into the stretch then came up empty. DEBDURITE failed to menace. ADANO broke slowly and was no threat. PROFESSIONAL surged to the front three wide after a quarter, set the pace to the top of the stretch then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: King of the Ring
ENTRY.OWNER: Pappada Julie A and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, angled in late, gaining 6wide

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Seminole Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, 4path, angled out 2nd turn, came again, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Adano
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Artemus Eagle
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Klaatu
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, pressed, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Professional
ENTRY.COMMENT: surged 3w, set pace late stretch, stopped,
